net.adamcin.oakpal.core.checks

Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.adamcin.oakpal.core.checks.Rule

  • public final class Rule
extends Object
    Standard Rule tuple capturing a rule type (allow/deny) and a regex pattern.

    config options:

    type
    The Rule.RuleType of the rule: allow or deny. The meaning of this value is usually dependent on context.
    pattern
    A regular expression pattern matched against the full context value (start [^] and end [$] are assumed).
